class.rdfs:comment:
Describes a reservation for travel, dining or an event. Some reservations require tickets.

Note: This type is for information about actual reservations, e.g. in confirmation emails or HTML pages with individual confirmations of reservations. For offers of tickets, restaurant reservations, flights, or rental cars, use Offer.
class.rdfs:label: Reservation

schema:bookingAgent.rdfs:comment: 'bookingAgent' is an out-dated term indicating a 'broker' that serves as a booking agent.
schema:bookingAgent.rdfs:label: bookingAgent

schema:bookingTime.rdfs:comment: The date and time the reservation was booked.
schema:bookingTime.rdfs:label: bookingTime

schema:broker.rdfs:comment: An entity that arranges for an exchange between a buyer and a seller.  In most cases a broker never acquires or releases ownership of a product or service involved in an exchange.  If it is not clear whether an entity is a broker, seller, or buyer, the latter two terms are preferred.
schema:broker.rdfs:label: broker

schema:modifiedTime.rdfs:comment: The date and time the reservation was modified.
schema:modifiedTime.rdfs:label: modifiedTime

schema:priceCurrency.rdfs:comment:
The currency of the price, or a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

Use standard formats: ISO 4217 currency format e.g. "USD"; Ticker symbol for cryptocurrencies e.g. "BTC"; well known names for Local Exchange Tradings Systems (LETS) and other currency types e.g. "Ithaca HOUR".
schema:priceCurrency.rdfs:label: priceCurrency

schema:programMembershipUsed.rdfs:comment: Any membership in a frequent flyer, hotel loyalty program, etc. being applied to the reservation.
schema:programMembershipUsed.rdfs:label: programMembershipUsed

schema:provider.rdfs:comment: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.
schema:provider.rdfs:label: provider

schema:reservationFor.rdfs:comment: The thing -- flight, event, restaurant,etc. being reserved.
schema:reservationFor.rdfs:label: reservationFor

schema:reservationId.rdfs:comment: A unique identifier for the reservation.
schema:reservationId.rdfs:label: reservationId

schema:reservationStatus.rdfs:comment: The current status of the reservation.
schema:reservationStatus.rdfs:label: reservationStatus

schema:reservedTicket.rdfs:comment: A ticket associated with the reservation.
schema:reservedTicket.rdfs:label: reservedTicket

schema:totalPrice.rdfs:comment:
The total price for the reservation or ticket, including applicable taxes, shipping, etc.

Usage guidelines:

  • Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similiar Unicode symbols.
  • Use '.' (Unicode 'FULL STOP' (U+002E)) rather than ',' to indicate a decimal point. Avoid using these symbols as a readability separator.
schema:totalPrice.rdfs:label: totalPrice

schema:underName.rdfs:comment: The person or organization the reservation or ticket is for.
schema:underName.rdfs:label: underName
